Placemark.name: Point Atkinson Lighthouse
Placemark.description: The structure was built in 1914 on granite boulders jutting out into English Bay in West Vancouver, Canada.

Placemark.name: Lions Gate Bridge
Placemark.description: A suspension bridge that crosses the first narrows of Burrard Inlet and connects the City of Vancouver, British Columbia to the north shore municipalities. It has been designated a National Historic Site of Canada.
Placemark.snippet: Total length is 1823 m, with three reversible lanes.
